title: Death Sworn Katarina - E sound on dagger isn't processed
body:
Overall sound scheme is amazing and really interesting and fits thematic.
But E-sound on dagger is completely different and feels out of place.

P.S.:
Sound guy you did amazing job on ult!
I'm pretty sure sound change is intentional. Not sure if source is the one I think or it's just generic phantom/spirit sound.
For those who doesn't understand what I'm talking about below is a reference (picture is bad I know):
[Kayako Saeki (Ju-On)](http://youtube.com/watch?v=3XwWIepDRp4)

replies.body:
Hello! 

Thanks so much for the nice comments!  :) Got it, I'm making some tweaks to Katarina's E and other spell sounds so can take a look at this as well. Hoping to push it out to PBE today! 
Thanks again! :D
